==German== [[File:2011 newspapers Germany 6536528645 2400dbb7fb o.jpg|thumb|upright|Zeitungen]] ===Etymology=== From {{der|de|dum|tīdinge}}, whence is borrowed {{der|de|gmh|zīdunge}} ([[West Central German]]). From this the later [[Upper German]] form {{m|gmh|zītunge}}, and then the modern form. Compare {{cog|nl|tijding}}, {{cog|en|tiding}}. ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|de|/ˈt͡saɪ̯tʊŋ/}} {{a|standard}} * {{IPA|de|/ˈt͡saɪ̯tʊŋk/}} {{a|some speakers, chiefly northern Germany}} * {{audio|de|De-at-Zeitung.ogg|audio (Austria)}} * {{audio|de|De-Zeitung.ogg|audio (Germany)}} * {{hyphenation|de|Zei|tung}} ===Noun=== {{de-noun|f}} # [[newspaper]] # {{lb|de|archaic}} [[tidings]], [[news]] ====Declension==== {{de-decl-noun-f|en}} ===Further reading=== * {{R:Duden}} ---- ==Luxembourgish== ===Pronunciation=== * {{IPA|lb|/ˈt͡sɑɪ̯tuŋ/|[ˈt͡sɑɪ̯tʰuŋ]}} ===Noun=== {{lb-noun|f}} # [[newspaper]]
